articles.title: US exchanges Chinese detainees for three imprisoned Americans - POLITICO

articles.content:

articles.author: Sabrina Malhi
articles.title: Americans are not getting seasonal vaccines ahead of the holidays - The Washington Post
articles.description: Experts worry that the unenthusiastic embrace of vaccines could spark outbreaks and increased hospitalizations.
articles.content: As the holiday season approaches, public health experts are sounding the alarm about low vaccination rates against the coronavirus, flu and RSV. With gatherings and travel on the rise, many people ar… [+4987 chars]
